articles.title: Wall Street CEOs Warn of Market Pullback From Rich Valuations - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Wall Street chief executives said investors should brace for an equity market drawdown of more than 10% in the next 12 to 24 months, and that such a correction can be a positive development.

articles.title: Shein bans all sex dolls after outrage over childlike products - BBC
articles.description: Every listing and image related to the sex dolls has been removed from Shein's platform, the firm said.

articles.title: Google Spurns Disney Request to YouTube TV Restore ABC on Election Night - Variety
articles.description: On Monday, Disney asked Google to offer ABC to YouTube TV customers on Tuesday, Nov. 4, to bring them Election Night coverage. Google said no -- and suggested instead that Disney allow YouTube TV to bring ABC and ESPN back on the air as the two sides hash out…

articles.title: South Korea's Kospi snaps 4-session winning streak as Asia-Pacific markets trade mixed - CNBC
articles.description: Asia Pacific markets were mostly set to fall Tuesday, breaking ranks from Wall Street, which saw a tech-fuelled rally stateside.

articles.title: Palantir Reports Record Quarterly Revenue, Hikes Forecasts (PLTR) - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Palantir Technologies Inc. raised its annual revenue outlook to $4.4 billion and outpaced analyst estimates for third-quarter sales, though the shares declined in after-hours trading on concerns about the company’s lofty valuation after a record run-up.

articles.title: FDA's top drug regulator sued by Canadian pharmaceutical company - ABC News

Metsera Calls Pfizer's Claims 'Nonsense' In Latest Buyout Battle Salvo - Investor's Business Daily
articles.description: Metsera called Pfizer's claims "nonsense" in a follow-up Monday to Pfizer's lawsuit against Metsera and Novo Nordisk.

articles.title: S&P 500 Gains & Losses Today: Amazon Stock Jumps After OpenAI Deal; Kimberly-Clark Acquires Kenvue - Investopedia
articles.description: An AI collaboration boosted the company behind the largest U.S. cloud service on Monday, Nov. 3, 2025, while shares of the two companies involved in a consumer goods deal saw major moves.

articles.title: Amazon’s Deal With OpenAI Just Made Jeff Bezos $10 Billion Richer - Forbes
articles.description: Jeff Bezos’ stake in Amazon is up almost $30 billion since Friday.

articles.title: Trump on Binance cryptocurrency tycoon he pardoned: "I don't know who he is" - CBS News
articles.description: President Trump told 60 Minutes he doesn't know the Binance crypto exchange founder he pardoned. Binance has done business with the Trump family's crypto firm World Liberty Financial.

articles.description: Even with strong demand up until the federal tax credit expired, Hyundai’s EV sales crashed last month. Hyundai, Ford, Kia,...

articles.title: Warren Buffett’s Cash Up to $382 Billion: 2 Dividend Stocks He Never Sells - 24/7 Wall St.
articles.description: Despite Berkshire Hathaway being a net seller of stocks for the past three years, Warren Buffett would never sell these two dividend stocks.

articles.title: Millennium Sells $2 Billion Minority Stake in Hedge Fund Firm - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Izzy Englander sold a roughly 15% stake in his Millennium Management to a group of investors, helping to prepare one of the world’s largest hedge funds for a time when he no longer sits at the helm.
